item.title: How to prepare a systematic review of economic evaluations for clinical practice guidelines: database selection and search strategy development (part 2/3)
item.description: An Evidence Review Group Evaluation of the NICE Single Technology Appraisal for obinutuzumab in combination with chemotherapy for first-line treatment of advanced follicular lymphoma.
